analysis.description:
RadiCards.gift (/unique_contracts/0x580a29fa60b86aaff102743de5cba60bb5f9de75.sol#1913-1978) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _to.transfer(EPHEMERAL_ADDRESS_FEE) (/unique_contracts/0x580a29fa60b86aaff102743de5cba60bb5f9de75.sol#1935)
	- _sentToAddress.transfer(_giftAmount) (/unique_contracts/0x580a29fa60b86aaff102743de5cba60bb5f9de75.sol#1975)

Reentrancy in RadiCards.gift (/unique_contracts/0x580a29fa60b86aaff102743de5cba60bb5f9de75.sol#1913-1978):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(getMinCardPriceInWei(_cardIndex) <= msg.value,Must send at least the minimum amount to buy card) (/unique_contracts/0x580a29fa60b86aaff102743de5cba60bb5f9de75.sol#1953-1954)
	External calls sending eth:
	- _to.transfer(EPHEMERAL_ADDRESS_FEE) (/unique_contracts/0x580a29fa60b86aaff102743de5cba60bb5f9de75.sol#1935)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- cards (/unique_contracts/0x580a29fa60b86aaff102743de5cba60bb5f9de75.sol#1963)
	- tokenIdPointer (/unique_contracts/0x580a29fa60b86aaff102743de5cba60bb5f9de75.sol#1962-1963)

elements.expression: require(bool,string)(getMinCardPriceInWei(_cardIndex) <= msg.value,Must send at least the minimum amount to buy card)
